purpleculture_pinyin:
chāi
to tear open; to tear down; to tear apart; to open
разорвать; снести; разорвать; открыть
purpleculture_info:
Antonyms: 装
Pictophonetic: 斥 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
拆迁 [ chāi qiān ]: to demolish a building and relocate the inhabitants
拆除 [ chāi chú ]: to tear down; to demolish; to dismantle; to remove
拆借 [ chāi jiè ]: short-term loan
拆卸 [ chāi xiè ]: to unload; to dismantle
拆毁 [ chāi huǐ ]: to dismantle; to demolish

heisig_chinese_memo: You reprimand your kids because they take apart household objects with their fingers and don't put them back together. &nbsp
Ru_trainchinese: chāi: (глаг) распаковывать; разбирать, сносить (напр., дом), разрушать, выбивать
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: You reprimand your kids because they take apart household objects with their fingers and don't put them back together. &nbsp
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " hand ", the sound of " repulsion " means cracking and opening. "Poetry·Daya·Shengmin": "Birthday Mi Jueyue, if you are a gentleman, you will not be dismantled, nor will it be harmless."

" Demolition " can mean split. Tang Zhangbi "The Divide": "The mountains and rivers want to tear down the people, but the strong men will keep the king."

" Disassembly " can also mean separation and discrimination. "The Eight Classics of Han Feizi": "The ginseng must be dismantled, and the Wu will be angry." Chen Qiyou's collection of explanations: "The ginseng must separate its words and verify its merits. The merit is the matter, and the deeds are rewarded; merit; If you don’t take it right, you will be punished if you don’t take it right.”

" Demolition " can also mean demolishing or dismantling. Tang Dufu "From Beijing to Fengxian County, Five Hundred Chinese Characters": "Fortunately, the river beam has not been demolished, but the branches are rustling."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " hand ", the sound of " repulsion " means cracking and opening.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「斥」聲，表示裂開、綻開。《詩‧大雅‧生民》：「誕彌厥月，先生如達，不拆不副，無菑無害。」

　　「拆」可指分裂。唐張碧〈鴻溝〉：「山河欲拆人煙分，壯士鼓勇君王存。」

　　「拆」也可表示分別、辨析。《韓非子‧八經》：「行參必拆，揆伍必怒。」陳奇猷集釋：「行參必分拆其言而驗其功，功當其事，事當其言則賞；功不當其事，事不當其言則罰。」

　　「拆」還可表示拆毀、拆除。唐杜甫〈自京赴奉先縣詠懷五百字〉：「河梁幸未拆，枝撐聲窸窣。」
humanum_short_description: 從「手」，「斥」聲，表示裂開、綻開。

從「 手 」，「 斥 」聲，表示裂開、綻開。《詩‧大雅‧生民》：「誕彌厥月，先生如達，不拆不副，無菑無害。」 「 拆 」可指分裂。唐張碧〈鴻溝〉：「山河欲拆人煙分，壯士鼓勇君王存。」 「 拆 」也可表示分別、辨析。《韓非子‧八經》：「行參必拆，揆伍必怒。」陳奇猷集釋：「行參必分拆其言而驗其功，功當其事，事當其言則賞；功不當其事，事不當其言則罰。」 「 拆 」還可表示拆毀、拆除。唐杜甫〈自京赴奉先縣詠懷五百字〉：「河梁幸未拆，枝撐聲窸窣。」
From the " hand", the sound of " repulsion" means cracking and opening. "Poetry·Daya·Shengmin": "Birthday Mi Jueyue, if you are a gentleman, you will not be dismantled, nor will it be harmless." " Demolition" can mean split. Tang Zhangbi "The Divide": "The mountains and rivers want to tear down the people, but the strong men will keep the king." " Disassembly" can also mean separation and discrimination. "The Eight Classics of Han Feizi": "The ginseng must be dismantled, and the Wu will be angry." Chen Qiyou's collection of explanations: "The ginseng must separate its words and verify its merits. The merit is the matter, and the deeds are rewarded; merit; If you don’t take it right, you will be punished if you don’t take it right.” " Demolition" can also mean demolishing or dismantling. Tang Dufu "From Beijing to Fengxian County, Five Hundred Chinese Characters": "Fortunately, the river beam has not been demolished, but the branches are rustling."

拆字的基本解释

拆
chāi
把合在一起的弄开：拆信。拆洗。拆卸。拆字。
〔拆白〕方言，流氓骗取财物。
分散，毁掉：拆散。拆台。拆迁。
搭装

拆
cā
方言，排泄（大小便）：拆烂污（喻不负责任）。
搭装

拆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chāi］
［《集韻》恥格切，入陌，徹。］
(1)同“坼”。裂开；绽开。
(2)指分裂。
(3)分别，辨析。
(4)打开；拆开。
(5)拆毁；拆除。
(6)指大拇指与食指伸张时的距离。
(7)按比例算钱。
(8)旧时用掷钱来定阳爻和阴爻的卜卦方法。以钱背为单数，钱面为双数，合计三钱面、背。单数则为阳，称单；双数则为阴，称拆。
[②]［cā］
排泄。参见“拆2爛污”。

拆字的英文翻译

◎ 拆
dismantle, remove, tear open

拆字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　拆； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页424第21
【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?恥格切，音坼。裂也，開也。【易·解卦】雷雨作，而百果草木皆甲拆。【疏】皆孚甲開拆，莫不解散也。　又毀也。　又【集韻】昌石切，音尺。擊也。　本作?。或作?。又作坼。

拆字的源字形

拆字的起名意思

暂无。

Dismantle
Basic explanation of words
Dismantle
chāi
Open the combined one: open the letter. Take apart and wash. Disassemble. Split words.
[Zaibai] dialect, hooligan defrauded property.
Disperse, destroy: dismantle. Take down. Demolition.
Set up
Dismantle
cā
Dialect, excretion (urinary and defecation): Demolition (Yu irresponsible).
Set up
Dismantle
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chāi］
["Jiyun" is shameful, enters the street, and thoroughly. ]
(1) Same as "坼". Crack open;
(2) Refers to splitting.
(3) Respectively, distinguish.
(4) Open; take apart.
(5) Demolition; Demolition.
(6) Refers to the distance between the thumb and the index finger when stretched.
(7) Calculate money proportionally.
(8) The old method of divination by throwing money to fix Yang Yao and Yin Yao. The money back is the singular number, and the money side is the even number. There are three money sides and backs in total. The singular number is yang, which is called simple; the even number is yin, which is called dismantling.
[②]［cā］
excretion. See "demolition 2 rotten dirt".
Dismantle

dismantle, remove, tear open

Hit also.　This work?. Or for?. Make another 坼.

会意字。从于(手),其古文字形体像手,表示用手把东西拆开;从斥,斥有使离开、分散义。本义是拆开。
Ochai ①打开;拆开:~信」~洗|~除。②拆毁:~台1
~除「过河~桥。eca 排泄:~烂污。

Снеси.
. プ
chāi
1) разбирать, разлагать (на части); демонтировать; разряжать (мину, снаряд); разламывать, ломать; разрушать
拆棉花 убирать хлопок
拆房子 сносить дом
拆玩意儿 ломать (разбивать) игрушки
2) надрывать, разрывать; срывать; распарывать, вскрывать
拆信 вскрыть письмо
3) прорастать (о зерне)
4) (вм. 坼) лопаться, трескаться; разрываться
5) пядь (мера длины)
6) диал. выделять (из организма); испражняться
